message.content: {"id": "17289", "title": "Bug 17289: Combo box doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)", "description": "When attempting to click on the first Combo box, it does not take focus. It only takes focus when I drop down the combo list.", "OB": "The first Combo box in the application fails to take focus when clicked on. It only takes focus when the combo list is dropped down.", "EB": "N/A", "SR": "To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus immediately goes to the second Combo box labeled 'Repository Path:'."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

", 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Open "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog. Press "Tab" andfocus goes to the second Combo "Repository Path:". '}
